text: Lihue or LÄ«hue is an unincorporated census-designated place (CDP) and the county seat of Kauai County, Hawaii. Lihue (pronounced ) is the second largest town on the Hawaiian island of Kauai after Kapaa. As of the 2020 Census, the CDP had a total population of 8,004. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Hawaii Category:County seats in Hawaii
title: Lihue, Hawaii
